content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System
Located around position (-2.5, 24.0), consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5)
- Boiler at (-2.5, 24.0)
- Steam engine at (4.5, 24.5)
- Connected by pipe networks (fluid systems 1250 and 1251)
- Electric poles connecting to power network (id 7138)

### Iron Smelting Area
Multiple furnaces for iron plate production:
- Furnace at (0.0, 0.0)
- Active furnace at (2.0, 0.0) with coal fuel and iron ore processing
- Furnace at (4.0, 4.0) with coal fuel
- Furnace at (6.0, 4.0)

### Inserter Production Line
Located around position (23.5, 2.5), consists of:
- Assembling machine 1 at (23.5, 2.5) configured for inserter production
- Input wooden chest at (20.5, 2.5) containing 32 inserters
- Output wooden chest at (26.5, 2.5)
- Two burner inserters at (21.5, 2.5) and (25.5, 2.5) for material handling

### Logistic Science Pack Production
Located at (32.5, 5.5):
- Assembling machine 1 configured for logistic science pack production
- Connected to power network via small electric pole at (30.5, 7.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Power System Connection Issues
- Ensure proper pipe connections between boiler and steam engine
- Make sure steam engines are connected to the power network through electric poles

### Resource Management Issues
- Ensure sufficient coal is available before attempting to insert into boilers
- Keep track of iron plate production to maintain steady supply for crafting

### Assembly Machine Operation Issues
- Verify all required ingredients are available before attempting to craft items
- Ensure assembly machines are receiving power before starting production

### Research Management Issues
- Check if research is already completed before attempting to set it again
- Ensure research prerequisites are met before attempting to start new research

### Inventory Management
- Verify items are in inventory before attempting to insert them into machines
- Maintain sufficient raw materials for continuous production

### Crafting System Issues
- For items requiring machine crafting (like iron plates), use appropriate production facilities instead of manual crafting
- Ensure all sub-components are available before attempting to craft complex items
